Title: Network Audio System: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Network Audio System,
    the worst of which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

Background.Text: Network Audio System is a network transparent, client/server audio transport system.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Network Audio System. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A context-dependent attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Network Audio System users should upgrade to the latest version:

Packages which depend on this library may need to be recompiled. Tools
      such as revdep-rebuild may assist in identifying some of these packages.
